short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hovering over a company name or ticker to get it's current price and other trading info quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hovering over a company name or ticker, click Ctrl+Shift at same time, a popup window will show ticker's current price, company name , earning data and then you can directly go to TradingView chart or that ticker's Yahoo finance webpage just one click.
And you can directly go to Reddit's WSB's that's tickers' post. save you many clicks/time.
Information We Collect:
We only collect the ticker, stock or company name and the web address which you want get that ticker's price and only when the correct ticker shows in popup window. We use these information to get our extension and web service functioning.
Version update: 
1.16: click O to get near strike options price and can go to Yahoo's options chart to see detail options data.
